amount.header: Please select an amount or enter a custom amount

buyMeal.subheader: Send Chinatown Love will connect merchants with local organizations that will distribute your gifted meals to a community in need.
buyMeal.prompt: Please enter how many meals to gift
buyMeal.explanationFirst: By gifting a meal, your donation will still go directly to the merchant.
buyMeal.explanationSecond: Our partners will then distribute vouchers with those who can benefit the most from a free meal.

body.header: Sorry Your Dumpling Was Not Found
body.subHeader1: The page you are trying does not exist or has been moved.
body.subHeader2: Please try going back to the homepage.

merchantsPage.platformInfoDescription: We are providing an online platform to low-tech, cash-only, Asian-owned small businesses that have been disproportionately impacted by COVID-19.
merchantsPage.platformInfoAction: Support local merchants by making a donation or purchasing a voucher from them.
merchantsPage.flyerAsk: Know of any business owners that fit our target merchant?
merchantsPage.flyerDownload: Download our flyer to share with them.

donationPool.header: Checked out our merchants but not sure who to donate to first?
donationPool.description1: You can support by donating to our donation pool!
donationPool.description2: All donations will be distributed evenly to our merchants.

contributionBar.footer: 100% of all proceeds go to the businesses, and we cover the credit card processing fees.

descriptionBox.bullet2: Not fluent in English, run cash-only establishments, and not tech-savvy
descriptionBox.bullet3: Currently struggling to pay rent, utility bill and employee wages
descriptionBox.bullet4: Do not have websites, online delivery service, or vouchers available
descriptionBox.bullet5: Located in NYC Manhattan Chinatown, Flushing, or Bensonhurst
